system_context.name: Cambridge College JCR Welfare System
system_context.description: Help us design a digital platform to support the JCR welfare team in providing student support services, managing resources, and coordinating welfare activities within a Cambridge college.

questions.0: What specific communication features should the system include for students to request welfare support from the JCR team? (one point per response box)
questions.1: What inventory management capabilities does the welfare team need to track and distribute physical resources (e.g., sexual health supplies, wellbeing materials)? (one point per response box)
questions.2: What features should the system include to help the welfare team plan, schedule, and manage welfare events and support sessions? (one point per response box)
questions.3: What functions should be available to allow for smooth annual handover between outgoing and incoming welfare officers? (one point per response box)

system_context.name: Cambridge Student Society Event Management Platform
system_context.description: Help us design a digital platform for student societies to plan, promote, execute, and evaluate events, while managing resources, member participation, and society growth.

questions.0: What event planning tools should the system provide for society committees to organize events from conception to execution? (one point per response box)
questions.1: What features should the system include to help societies during the actual execution of events (e.g., check-in, attendee management, real-time coordination)? (one point per response box)
questions.2: What financial management capabilities should the system offer to help societies track event budgets and expenses? (one point per response box)
questions.3: What analytics and reporting features should the system provide to help societies evaluate past events and plan future ones? (one point per response box)

system_context.name: University Module Review System
system_context.description: A system for students to view, filter, and submit reviews for university modules

questions.0: If you were using an app to look up module reviews, what information would you want to see?
questions.1: What information about a reviewer would make their feedback more relevant for someone choosing a module?
questions.2: What filtering or sorting options should the app offer to help students find modules aligned with their priorities?
questions.3: What features in a review app would make it more likely for you to submit reviews for modules you've taken?
questions.4: How could the app help professors or departments use student reviews to improve modules?
questions.5: What additional features do you wish a module review app would have?
